channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom VDI Windows Meeting Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom VDI Windows Meeting Client

item.title: CVE-2023-28603|2024-09-19T19:24:00.946Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20vdi%20windows%20meeting%20client
item.description: Zoom VDI client installer prior to 5.14.0 contains an improper access control vulnerability. A malicious user may potentially delete local files without proper permissions.
